taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a menu model opened in the editor with many menu items.

step.cmd: In the editor view pane, select the menu item you want to move.

choices.choice: Click and hold the menu item, and move it to the appropriate place before releasing the mouse. This moves the menu item anywhere in the tree, to a lower or higher level in the hierarchy.
Press the Ctrl key whilst also pressing either the up arrow or the down arrow key. This moves the menu item up or down within the same level.
